data.prayer: Father, convict the 140,932 believers in Benshangul-Gumaz to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Benshangul-Gumaz, Ethiopia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Benshangul-Gumaz, Ethiopia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Benshangul-Gumaz, Ethiopia into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 326,594 who are far from you in Benshangul-Gumaz, Ethiopia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Berta, Benishangul people.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Benshangul-Gumaz, Ethiopia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Benshangul-Gumaz, Ethiopia to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Benshangul-Gumaz to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: Benshangul-Gumaz
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Yemeni, Arab, Sudanese, Uduk, Ganza, Mao, Northern
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Yemeni (5,700), Arab, Sudanese (20,000), Uduk (25,000), Ganza (700), Mao, Northern (3,800)
